name: Inferno Climber: Reborn
storyline:
A long, long time ago… There were five Purgatory Stones with enormous magical powers.

Purgatory Stones were owned by five different countries to keep the world in order.

However, as the time passed, evil and corruption spreads through the land. Purgatory Stones fell into the wrong hands. Monsters plagued all over the land. Thus, the world has fallen.

100 years later… An innocent soul made a pact with Death. The awakened one set forth in search for the Purgatory Stones.

Forge through hell in this survival action RPG!

Slashing, magic casting, arrow shooting, bombs throwing, exploring, eating, cooking, blacksmithing.

Defeat powerful bosses to collect all five Purgatory Stones in hell.
summary: “INFERNO CLIMBER” is a survival RPG set in a world called “Hell.” A fallen warrior makes a deal with the Reaper and sets out to collect the 5 Purgatory Stones in order to return to the world of the living. Along the way, the player will need to explore vast dungeons, fight their way through savage monsters and overcome ruthless traps to collect the Stones.
